ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Assessment done later than 300 months?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: If assessment done later than 300 months: number of months beyond 300
Assessment done prior to 300 months?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: If assessment done prior to 300 months: number of months before 300
In past 6 months: Number of months employed full-time
In past 6 months: Number of months employed part-time
In past 6 months: Number of months not working
In past 6 months: Primary role
Notes: 0 = Other; 1 = Leave of absence (holding job, plans to return); 2 = Student part time (<9 credit hours); 3 = Student full time (9+ credit hours); 4 = Homemaker; 5 = Retired; 6 = Unemployed but not expected to work (e.g., physically disabled or hospitalized); 7 = Unemployed but expected to work; 8 = Employed part time; 9 = Employed full time

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: Role pattern (select up to 3 categories)
Notes: 0 = Other; 1 = Leave of absence (holding job, plans to return); 2 = Student part time (<9 credit hours); 3 = Student full time (9+ credit hours); 4 = Homemaker; 5 = Retired; 6 = Unemployed but not expected to work (e.g., physically disabled or hospitalized); 7 = Unemployed but expected to work; 8 = Employed part time; 9 = Employed full time

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: Role pattern, specify
In past 6 months: Usual occupation
Participant disability status
Notes: 0 = Not disabled; 1 = Disabled medically; 2 = Disabled psychiatrically; 3 = Disabled medically & psychiatrically

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: Number of different employers
In past 6 months: Employed by >1 employer simultaneously
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: Psychiatric status rating
Notes: 1 = Full remission: No psychotic symptoms, no impairment; 2 = Full remission: No psychotic symptoms, minor impairment; 3 = Partial remission; 4 = Full relapse/episode; 5 = Partial relapse/episode; 7 = Don't know/Can't determine

ElementDescription: Psychotic symptoms
Notes: 0 = Not present; 1 = Subthreshold or transient; 2 = Definite, mild or encapsulated - no effect on functioning; 3 = Definite, moderate to severe - functioning affected; 7 = Don't know/can't determine

ElementDescription: Mood symptoms
Notes: 0 = Not present; 1 = Manic syndrome; 2 = Hypomania; 3 = Major depressive syndrome definite or probable; 4 = Dysthymia or subthreshold depressive symptoms; 5 = Mixed - concurrent (hypo)manic/depressive symptoms or rapid cycling; 7 = Don't know/can't determine

ElementDescription: Negative symptoms
Notes: 0 = Not present; 1 = Mild; 2 = Severe; 7 = Don't know/can't determine

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: Rate level of stressful events, using Severity of Psychosocial Stressors scale (DSM-III-R)
Notes: 0 = Inadequate information; 1 = None; 2 = Mild; 3 = Moderate; 4 = Severe; 5 = Extreme; 6 = Catastrophic

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: Length of time (in weeks) in the community
In past 6 months: Extent of outpatient treatment
Notes: 1 = Continuous treatment; 2 = Several brief periods; 3 = Consultation or brief period of treatment; 4 = None; 999 = N/A (patient hospitalized throughout follow-up)

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: nature of treatment = drug or alcohol tx
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 888 = DK

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: nature of treatment = psychotherapy
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 888 = DK

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: nature of treatment = antipsychotic meds
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 888 = DK

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: nature of treatment = non-antipsychotic meds
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 888 = DK

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: nature of treatment = unknown psychiatric meds
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 888 = DK

ElementDescription: In past 6 months: Predominant patient status
Notes: 1 = Outpatient, regular attendance (at least bimonthly); 2 = Outpatient, rarely seen; 3 = Day or Partial hospital patient; 4 = Inpatient; 5 = Institutionalized, other; 6 = Other (specify); 7 = Not in treatment; 888 = DK

ElementDescription: Specify: Other services from other sources for emotional, behavioral, or substance use problems (past 6 months)
In past 6 months: Other interim non-psychiatric hospitalizations
Notes: 0 = None; 1 = Medical, not psychiatric; 2 = Alcohol or drug

ElementDescription: Items rater did NOT feel confident rating
